value.title: One Way AI Will Help Human Workers: Ensuring They're Paid Fairly
value.excerpt: Automation will change the job landscape for many workers—but instead of taking everyone’s jobs away, AI is throwing into relief what kind of skills are most needed for today’s rapidly evolving job market.

value.title: Woman Using AI to Redesign Garden Sparks Debate: 'Cool But Sad'
value.excerpt: Paulina Machaj told Newsweek she's used artificial intelligence to generate design ideas and gain inspiration for what her courtyard garden could look like.

value.title: What have we learned about AI ethics? It's time for risk-based regulations
value.excerpt: The bad news? The typical approach to AI ethics hasn't worked. But a way forward is emerging - via a growing momentum for risk-based AI regulations.

value.title: The New Era Of Big Data
value.excerpt: TC Energy leveraged the image processing ML technology Amazon Rekognition from Amazon Web Services (AWS) to classify and label the digitized records and then deployed the AI service Textract to transform the handwritten letters into machine-readable words.

value.title: AI Startup Figure Raises $70 Million for Humanoid Robot
value.excerpt: AI robotics startup Figure raised $70 million to help develop a humanoid robot that it believes could one day take on a wide range of tasks traditionally performed by people.

value.title: Generative AI Podcasts Are Here. Prepare to Be Bored

value.title: Prediction: This Cathie Wood AI Stock Will Be 1 of the Top 5 Largest Companies by 2030
value.excerpt: Moreover, if Tesla achieved this, it could become one of the top five largest companies. As conditions stand now, Tesla's market cap already exceeds $570 billion, making it the ninth-largest company in terms of market cap. In today's market, its market cap would have to exceed $1.2 trillion to become a top-five company.

value.title: Beyond text: AI model digests 80 hours of video to learn sign language

value.title: The AI-driven rally in big tech stocks is forcing us to consider some trimming

value.title: 5 Key Threats AI Poses To Business Owners In 2023 (and How To Survive Them)

value.title: IT services firms leverage generative AI capabilities for clients

value.title: 'I would never use AI': Americans detail how much they use artificial intelligence in their daily lives

value.title: Jugalbandi: Microsoft-backed Indian group aims to bridge language barrier with AI assistant
value.excerpt: An Indian research group backed by Microsoft and Infosys co-founder Nandan Nilekani is using generative AI, the technology behind chatbot sensation ChatGPT, for a mobile assistant that aims to make information on government schemes accessible in multiple languages.

value.title: Fake image of explosion near Pentagon stirs concerns over artificial intelligence

value.title: The G7 Comes Together On AI Aspirations, Lagging China On Deliverables
